text: The Battle of San Jacinto refers to at least two paintings by Henry Arthur McArdle, depicting the Battle of San Jacinto. One version, measuring approximately by , is installed in the Texas Senate chamber of the Texas State Capitol in Austin, Texas. Note: User must click on "Battle of San Jacinto". A smaller oil painting, measuring by , was discovered in late 2009; this version is not a copy or study for the monumental painting in the Capitol. title: The Battle of San Jacinto (McArdle)
